extendedInfo.description: Designed by physicians, USMLE Step 2 smartcards are a perfect way to review USMLE Step 2 on the move.These cards are more than just flashcards as they help study topics by sorting between Easy and difficult cards.This app enable you to pin cards that you need to revise making it easier to go back to difficult topics.This version includes over 3000 essential USMLE tested facts.Other features include* Teaching mode - Lets you see the question and answer together or turn it off to see only Questions then simply swipe on the screen to view answer.* Resources - Direct links to USMLE sites relevant to Step 2* Works for both ipad and iphone

reviews.title: Wow! Finally a great but cheap flashcard app!!
reviews.comment: Pros: Does have a lot of questions! (3000 or so) - The answers so far have been accurate. - Very easy interface! - Won\'t cost you an arm (or fingers, if you\'re filthy rich.)   Cons: answers are not very detailed (I\'m good with that, I use it just for review.) - Won\'t do your laundry or dishes, lol.   Overall, I think this is the best value for money for flashcards app market for usmle!  - a very happy student :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some questions & answer out of place under Neuro
reviews.comment: Have only tried the neurology flash cards so far. Towards the end of the set, some questions & answers are out of place. For example, Card 233 asks: Ependymoma in children is commonly located in what ventricle? Ans: Schwannomas. The next card with a diff question has the ans: 4th ventricle. This goes on until card 265. Then it gets back in order, then it screws up again a little later. I wish they had a function where we could put Q\'s and A\'s in order ourselves, but it doesn\'t have one. I don\'t even know how many of the other subject cards are like this. Either we get an update of this software with the Qs and A\'s in the correct order, or we continue using this app hoping that we already know which Q&A is a misplacement error and which isn\'t.
reviews.author: Rizwan Haque

reviews.title: Good data
reviews.comment: Happy to see an updated app finally... A :-) user
reviews.author: A Google User
